body.p: Many respondents to both the IASB’s 2009 Impairment Exposure Draft and the FASB’s 2010 proposed Update commented that achieving a common outcome for impairment accounting would be highly desirable. The boards agreed and, in January 2011, jointly published the Supplementary Document, which built on their individual original Exposure Drafts and sought to incorporate the objectives of both boards’ original impairment proposals (see paragraphs BC5.96–BC5.101 for further discussions on the Supplementary Document’s proposals and feedback).
